Package breakout

Class Brick

java.lang.Object
breakout.Brick
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Drawable, Entity
public class Brick extends Object implements Cloneable, Entity
Represents a brick. This class defines the Prototype Design Pattern.
Author:
Ishan Pranav
